WorkItem.Description:
My hosting does not use the normal port 25 for outgoing mail.  I modified the code (version 2.0) to allow for the port number to be specified.  Is there any way to get this included into the main project?
 
To allow the port to be configured I did the following:
In web config I added the following line:
<add key="ClubMailPort" value="80" />
in the appSettings section with the reset of the mail settings.
 
I file Admin/EMail.aspx.vb I added the following to the btnSend_Click sub:
<add key="ClubMailPort" value="80" />
just after smtp is declared.
WorkItem.Summary: Need ability to specify the SMTP port
